title: How to Look Good Every Day

steps.title: Make yourself look friendly and approachable.
steps.content: Make yourself look friendly and approachable. Walking around with a constant frown is like wearing a "Keep Away" sign. Even a little smile will brighten your face, making you look friendlier and, thus, more attractive. You don’t have to have a huge grin on your face every day (that’s a little scary), but a small, pleasant smile can make you look more approachable and attractive. [1] X Research source Studies also show that smiling can make you look younger. Smiling a lot can also help boost your mood and make you feel happier.

steps.title: Self-esteem can give you an incredible makeover.
steps.content: Self-esteem can give you an incredible makeover. [2] X Expert Source Shelley Golden Personal Branding Image Consultant & Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 10 July 2020. Put your chin up and keep your spine straight. Push your shoulders back and try to look everyone in the eye as you talk to them. When you’re standing, spread your feet into a wide stance. The more confidence you exude, the better you’re going to look. [3] X Trustworthy Source Mind U.K.-based mental health charity focused on providing advice and resources to anyone facing mental health problems. Go to source Look more approachable by keeping your arms uncrossed. Even if you don’t feel totally confident, you can fake it until you make it. Before you know it, you’ll actually feel more confident than when you started.

steps.title: The right haircut can open up your face and refresh your style.
steps.content: The right haircut can open up your face and refresh your style. Choose something that flatters your face . For men, round faces look handsome with tapered fades or mid fades with a pompadour, square faces look good with buzzcuts and side-swept parts, oval faces look strong with undercuts, and heart-shaped faces look good with long fringe and a lot of volume up top. For women, round faces look great with angular haircuts, square faces look good with lots of soft layers, oval faces look awesome with blunt bangs, and heart-shaped faces look great with swooped bangs. If you’re not sure what to get, talk with your hair stylist to figure out what’s right for you. [4] X Research source Don’t be surprised by the price tag—a good haircut can cost upwards of $100 in a salon.

steps.title: Give yourself a healthy glow all year round.
steps.content: Give yourself a healthy glow all year round. While indoor tanning beds are dangerous (and can increase your risk for skin cancer), a spray tan isn’t risky at all. You can get one professionally done or use a self-tanning lotion at home for a bronzed, glowy look. [5] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source Try not to go too dark too fast. Too much self-tanner runs the risk of looking orange.

steps.title: Make those pearly whites shine again.
steps.content: Make those pearly whites shine again. If your teeth are looking a little dingy or yellow, head to the store and pick up a package of white strips. If you have any harsh stains or discoloration, make an appointment with your dentist for a professional whitening treatment. White teeth can make you look younger and more attractive right away! [6] X Trustworthy Source American Dental Association World's largest dental professional organization and advocate for proper oral health Go to source Whitening your teeth can lead to increased tooth sensitivity, so use caution if you already have sensitive teeth.

steps.title: A good skincare routine can make you look glowy.
steps.content: A good skincare routine can make you look glowy. Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and warm water, then dab on a moisturizer. If you have oily skin or you’re prone to breakouts, try using products with azelaic acid in them. If you’re noticing wrinkles or dark marks on your skin, try an anti-aging cream that contains retinoids. [7] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source Add sunscreen on top of everything to protect your skin from UV rays. SPF 30 or higher will keep your skin looking young and fresh for much longer.

steps.title: Pick a style and go for clothes that fit.
steps.content: Pick a style and go for clothes that fit. First, think of a style or a person you want to emulate: maybe you like the skater aesthetic, or perhaps you’re going for a more business casual vibe. Then, look online for inspiration as you pick out pieces. You don’t have to spend a ton on a new wardrobe—you might be surprised at what you find in your very own closet. [8] X Expert Source Shelley Golden Personal Branding Image Consultant & Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 10 July 2020. As you pick out clothes, make sure they flatter your body type and fit you well.

steps.title: It will keep you fit, toned, and good looking.
steps.content: It will keep you fit, toned, and good looking. There’s no need to bulk up and gain a ton of muscle, but aim for getting 30 minutes of moderate exercise per day. You could try running, jogging, swimming, biking, hiking, or doing yoga to keep your body in shape. Focus on feeling good in your own body, not conforming to anyone else’s beauty standards. [9] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source Not only will exercising keep you looking good, it also releases endorphins to make you feel good, too. Reader Poll: We asked 179 wikiHow readers what helps them stay motivated to exercise, and 53% of them said setting goals for themselves. [Take Poll]

steps.title: The right nutrition can clear your skin and make you look great.
steps.content: The right nutrition can clear your skin and make you look great. Try to eat plenty of lean proteins, fruits, vegetables, and whole grains as you make your meals. In particular, vitamin C, vitamin E, healthy plant fats, and fish are all great for your skin, and they can help you look glowy and more attractive. [10] X Research source You can find vitamin C in most citrus fruits, like oranges, limes, and lemons. Get your vitamin E from nuts, seeds, fruits, and veggies. Healthy plant fats come from avocados, canola oil, olive oil, peanuts, and flaxseeds.

steps.title: It’s not a necessity, but it can help you feel more confident.
steps.content: It’s not a necessity, but it can help you feel more confident. To cover up blemishes and make your skin look glowy, try a light BB cream or a tinted moisturizer. Add some mascara and a bit of lip gloss for an everyday look that can’t be beat. Or, go all out glam with full coverage foundation, fun eyeshadow, falsies, and bold lipstick. Just like your clothes, your makeup should enhance your natural features and be appropriate for the occasion. [11] X Research source If you’ve never worn makeup before and you want to try it out, look up some online tutorials on YouTube. You don’t have to break your bank to buy expensive makeup products. Most drug stores have the basics, and you can start with those as you learn how to apply them.
